text: Rampant Transgression
Look! The hand of Yahweh is not too short ⸤to save⸥,\f + \fr 59:1 \ft Literally “from saving” \f*
and his ear is not \add too\add* dull ⸤to hear⸥.\f + \fr 59:1 \ft Literally “from hearing” \f*
Rather, your iniquities have been ⸤barriers⸥\f + \fr 59:2 \ft Literally “dividers” \f* between you and your God,
and your sins have hidden \add his\add* face from you, from hearing.
For your hands are defiled with blood,
and your fingers with iniquity.
Your lips have spoken lies,
your tongue speaks wickedness.
There is nobody ⸤who pleads with⸥\f + \fr 59:4 \ft Literally “calling in” \f* justice,
and there is nobody who judges with honesty.
They rely on nothing
and speak vanity.
They conceive trouble
and beget iniquity;
they hatch viper eggs,
and they weave a spider web.
One who eats their eggs dies,
and that which is pressed is hatched \add as\add* a serpent.
Their webs cannot become clothing,
and they cannot cover themselves with their works.
Their works \add are\add* works of iniquity,
and deeds\f + \fr 59:6 \ft Hebrew “deed” \f* of violence \add are\add* in their hands.
Their feet run to evil,
and they hasten to shed innocent blood.
Their thoughts \add are\add* thoughts of iniquity;
devastation and destruction \add are\add* in their highways.
They do not know \add the\add* way of peace,
and there is no justice in their firm paths.
They have made their paths crooked for themselves;
everyone ⸤who walks⸥\f + \fr 59:8 \ft Literally “walking” \f* in it knows no peace.
Therefore justice is far from us,
and righteousness does not reach us.
We wait for light, but\f + \fr 59:9 \ft Or “and” \f* look! \add there is\add* darkness;
for brightness, \add but\add* we walk in darkness.
We grope like the blind \add along\add* a wall,
and we grope ⸤as without⸥\f + \fr 59:10 \ft Literally “like there are no” \f* eyes.
We stumble at noon as \add in\add* the twilight;
among the strong \add we are\add* like the dead.
We all groan like bears,
and we coo mutteringly like doves.
We wait for justice, but\f + \fr 59:11 \ft Or “and” \f* there is none;
for salvation, \add but\add* it is far from us.
For our transgressions are numerous before you,
and our sins ⸤testify⸥\f + \fr 59:12 \ft Or “answers” \f* against us.
Indeed, our transgressions \add are\add* with us,
and we know our iniquities:
transgressing and denying Yahweh,
and turning ⸤away from following⸥\f + \fr 59:13 \ft Literally “back from behind” \f* our God;
speaking oppression and falsehood,
conceiving and uttering words of deception from \add the\add* heart.
And justice is pushed back,
and righteousness stands afar;
for truth stumbles in the public square,
and straightforwardness is unable to enter,
and truth is missing,
and he who turns aside from evil \add is\add* plundered.
And Yahweh saw,
and it was displeasing in his eyes that there was no justice
And he saw that there was no man,
and he was appalled that there was no one who intercedes,
so\f + \fr 59:16 \ft Or “and” \f* his arm came to assist him,
and his righteousness ⸤was what⸥\f + \fr 59:16 \ft Literally “it” \f* sustained him.
And he put on righteousness like \add a\add* breastplate,
and a helmet of salvation on his head,
and he put on garments of vengeance \add for\add* clothing,
and he wrapped \add himself in\add* zeal as \add in a\add* robe.
According to deeds, so he will repay;
wrath to his enemies, requital to those who are his ⸤enemies⸥.\f + \fr 59:18 \ft Literally “hostile” \f*
He will repay requital to the coastlands.
So\f + \fr 59:19 \ft Or “And” \f* they shall fear the name of Yahweh from \add the\add* west,
and his glory from the sunrise,
for he will come like \add a\add* narrow stream;
the wind of Yahweh drives it on.
“And a redeemer will come to Zion,
to those in Jacob who turn away from transgression,”
⸤declares⸥\f + \fr 59:20 \ft Literally “declaration of” \f* Yahweh.
“And as for me, this \add is\add* my covenant with them, says Yahweh:
my spirit that \add is\add* upon you,
and my words that I have placed in your mouth
shall not depart from your mouth,
or\f + \fr 59:21 \ft Or “and” \f* from the mouths\f + \fr 59:21 \ft Hebrew “mouth” \f* of your ⸤children⸥,\f + \fr 59:21 \ft Literally “offspring” \f*
or\f + \fr 59:21 \ft Or “and” \f* from the mouths\f + \fr 59:21 \ft Hebrew “mouth” \f* of ⸤your children’s children⸥,”\f + \fr 59:21 \ft Literally “the offspring of your offspring” \f*
says Yahweh, “from now on and forever.”
